name: Uma Shanti Villa
address: Pejeng Kawan, Tampaksiring, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80552, Indonesia
review 1: Location was very far then what i expected. view is quit nice its a calm place to chill. cleaning staff was not so good and when i gave them this feed back they said it was hard to clean as room was messy. so i would like to add few pic for what i meant. also switch boards were broken which is quit dangerous. Cleaning staff washed to used cups and spoon in bathroom wash basin and left the spoons there also not cleaned properly.
review 2: The location has only one way car access to go to the hotel, very small and narrow for a car. And the road is rocky and slippery when it's raining. But the room and the privateness is very nice.
review 3:
The best value for money I ever had.
The rooms are clean and new, everything is working and in good condition.
The pool is nice.
Only six rooms so it‚Äôs very quiet.
It‚Äôs located just 15min ride outside of Ubud and the location has not been a problem at all.
The staff is always present, nice and helpful.
All perfect.
review 4: Poorly maintained room and bed bugs on our beds!! Me and my family had many rashes after sleeping on the bed and immediately cancel the rest of our stay there. Room is damp and bathroom not clean. Location is very rural (barely can fit 1 car and the road has no street light at night).
review 5: It‚Äôs such a lovely place. Very clean and comfy. The staff is very friendly, the pool is great and the food available there is super tasty. Also it is pretty close to ubud, easy to reach by grab, even though it‚Äôs located on a street that‚Äôs not paved. Highly recommend, definitely would return
